# Neurise

> The science of happiness, made simple.

Neurise is an iOS app that helps users build science-backed habits for happiness and well-being through personalized daily recommendations.

## Site Content

- Blog: /blog/
- Privacy Policy: /privacypolicy/
- Terms of Service: /termsofservice/
- Support: /support/
- Press Kit: /presskit/

## Markdown Content

Raw markdown versions are available at /md/blog/[slug].md
